EmailTemplate.name: UK Welcome MMB
EmailTemplate.subject: QuickBooks Online order confirmation – how to move your data
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
It was good to talk to you today about QuickBooks Online.
I’m pleased to report that we’ve now set up your QuickBooks Online account.
How to sign in
You can sign in to QuickBooks Online at www.intuit.co.uk. Just use these details:
User ID:
{!Opportunity.Legacy_Treatment_Name__c}
Password:
{!Opportunity.Legacy_Treatment_Code__c}
Company ID:
{!Opportunity.Company_ID__c}
How to move your data
The instructions attached to this email explain what you should do now to move your data to QuickBooks Online. They tell you how to:
· Login to QuickBooks Online for the first time
· Upload your company data file to the Movemybooks website.
If you have any questions about these instructions, please call our care team on 0808 234 5337. We’re available 8am — 8pm on working days and happy to help.
If you have any other queries or just aren’t sure who to speak to, you can also call me directly on {!User.Phone}.
Tell us how it’s going
We hope that getting started with QuickBooks Online has been easy so far.
Your feedback helps improve the service we provide, so we'll send you a survey within the next 24 hours. It would be great if you could complete it to let us know how you’ve found things.
You can also send any other thoughts straight to my manager by clicking the green tick below.
Thanks again for choosing QuickBooks.
Kind regards,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName}
{!User.Email}
